entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
